mapper.select: SELECT t.task_id,t.user_id,u.phonenumber,u.nickname, t.task_title,t.task_content,t.task_type,t.task_status, t.personal,t.like_peas,t.lottery_type,t.hot, t.quantity,t.sale_price,t.sale_amount,t.lock_time, t.settle_coins,t.settle_time,t.create_date, a2.answer_id,a2.answer,a2.odds,a2.is_right, f.tfb_id,f.team_name,f.court_type, p.pic_id,p.pic_url,p.pic_type, o.user_id answerUserId,u2.nickname userName,o.answer_id userAnswer,a.answer userAnswerName,a.is_right answer_right,o.total FROM t_tasks t JOIN m_users u on t.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN t_task_football f on f.task_id = t.task_id and f.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN t_task_pictures p on p.task_id = t.task_id and p.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN (SELECT user_id,task_id,answer_id,COUNT(1) total FROM t_task_orders GROUP BY user_id,task_id,answer_id) o on o.task_id = t.task_id LEFT JOIN m_users u2 on u2.user_id = o.user_id LEFT JOIN t_task_answers a on a.answer_id = o.answer_id and a.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN t_task_answers a2 on a2.task_id = t.task_id WHERE t.is_delete = 0 AND t.task_id = #{taskId}
